A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a joke of a script!! How Luke Skywalker was treated in this movie was a disgrace to the character. The entire Finn/Rose storyline of the movie served NO purpose to the movie at all. Things that were set up in episode 7 were had no mention or even furtherance of any kind. The movie was overly jokey and even preachy at times. I dont care about your social justice/animal rights heavy handed bull sh*t. R2-D2 and C-3PO\, the characters who are a substantial part of the saga and kicked off the story\, were wasted and criminally underused. The script was all over the place and a mess. Visually the movie was amazing. Mark Hamill gave the performance of his career\, although his character was treated like a damn joke. If this is the direction the Star Wars franchise is going Lucasfilm/Disney has another thing coming. Again I cant stress how terribly the character of the hero of our galaxy Luke Skywalker was handled. I was very hyped for this movie but ultimately I am disappointed and ashamed that this is now Star Wars cannon. I enjoyed the call backs but this was not a good script. The movie was entertaining at times but a mess and a disservice to fans of a galaxy far far away. Im not looking forward to the next episode the way I was walking out of the movie theater two years ago. - Devin Bell
